# ipv4Settings

**Instance Property**

The tunnel IP version 4 settings.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var ipv4Settings: NEIPv4Settings? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the IPv4 routes specifying what IPv4 traffic to route to the tunnel, as well as the IPv4 address and netmask to assign to the TUN interface.

## Accessing network properties

- **NEIPv4Settings**: The IPv4 settings of an IP layer network tunnel.
- **ipv6Settings**: The tunnel IP version 6 settings.
- **NEIPv6Settings**: The IPv6 settings of an IP layer network tunnel.
- **tunnelOverheadBytes**: The number of bytes added to each tunneled packet for storing tunneling protocol headers.
- **mtu**: The size of the maximum trasnmission unit, in bytes.
